attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure the law which puts theatre owners at risk of imprisonment, if they twist the words of theatre critics' to their own advantage, is extended to himself and all government ministers and elected politicians who consistently twist the truth to their own benefit, to avoid criticism and evade responsibility, to ensure that playing party politics with the future prosperity of the people of this country is seen not to be detrimental to the national good.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a theatre owner can be sent to prison for twisting critics' words to his own advantage then politicians who twist words to the  benefit of themselves and party politics must also be liable to be sent to jail.
